alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 9:59AM CST until February 01 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Simpson and Copiah Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Columbia. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low areas along the river are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 18.0 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Columbia 17.0 15.6 Sat 9 am CST 17.0 17.9 18.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CST.
